sentences.sContent: He's as bitter as gall at your desertion and its consequences: don't expect thanks for this noble devotion.
sentences.sContent_eng: He's as bitter as gall at your desertion and its consequences: don't expect thanks for this noble devotion.
sentences.sCn: 他对于你的遗弃和这后果是怨恨透啦；对于你这种高尚的爱情不要期待感谢吧。

words.tran: 难堪的；使烦恼的；擦伤人的
五倍子的；镓的，瘿的；法国人的

trans.tranOther: anger and hate that will not go away
